page.title: 18NEW HOUSING ESTATES REDDITCH
page.content: In 6 square kilometres around our school, there are 7 new major house builders busy creating a completely different landscape for{Headless Cross The New Town environment has attracted these builders to this area. Each seem to form their own estate,and are competing with each other for buyers.The end result of this is like having a row of shops in the main street all displaying their goods in the windows. They produce varying styles of buildings, in many different sizes. Some are detached houses,while others are just semi-detached,or even town houses in rows. The population of the region has soared as a result, and it will take time for a community to grow up from such a new start.
